Instruction: Combine tofu, Greek yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, and red chili powder in a bowl. Marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Roast cashews in a dry skillet until golden brown.
Blend roasted cashews, onion, tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, and red chili powder into a smooth paste.
Heat ghee in a pan. Add the onion-tomato paste and cook until oil separates.
Add the marinated tofu cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add kasuri methi and season with salt to taste.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
